title: (x) All Blacks New Zealand / block gothic w/ semi-serifs - NZ Rugby Chisel {Gary S}
content:
Hi Guys,

does any know the font used in the New Zealand All Blacks rugbyteam logo?  
Seems custom made? Thanks in advance.

René

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20140117150814im_/http:/typophile.com/files/All_Blacks_logo_5281.png)
author: ReneRutten

comments.content:
I would guess a customization of a block gothic style, such as Ultimate Middleweight, [Knockout No. 91](http://web.archive.org/web/20140117150814/http:/www.typography.com/fonts/font_styles.php?productLineID=100013) from H&FJ, with added left serifs.

- Mike Yanega
It's [NZ Rugby Chisel](http://web.archive.org/web/20140117150814/http:/www.klim.co.nz/custom_chisel.php) by Kris Sowersby, under direction from DNA Design.

Thanks,  
unfortunately not a commercial font.

Well, you could simulate it starting with Knockout No. 91 ;-)

- Mike Yanega
Great Font for use in design!
